title: Setting up Thunderbird, Cannot add new email addresses from stored profile
content: Dear Support I am adding Thunderbird to a new computer. Setting up, it asks to import from a file. I specify the .profile I stored. It says it added all the files, and finds al email accounts. But when trying to add the Startmail email account to Thunderbird, it fails with message "Unable to login at server. Probably wrong configuration, username or password. I can login (for example) to my startmail email address through Startmail.com on Firefox.
creator: joroles1

title: TBird not accessing local folders after going from w10 to W11
content:
Migrating my TBird account from a W10 machine to a W11 machine. Followed the process in the help section. The W11 box has my 4 Gmail accounts and my address book. No local folders showing on W11. If I look in my profile -mail- Local Folders in File Explorer they are all there - just not showing when I open TBird.

The W10 version is 140.3.0esr and says it is up to date. The W11 version is 143.0 and says it is up to date.

Reinstalling TBird made no difference. Looking for suggestions so I can turn off the W10 box. - Thanks Marty
creator: misterg.mbg

title: Can now receive e-mail but cannot send
content:
I mucked up my decades old Thunderbird e-mail account on my desktop. After a password change in Spectrum webmail, I lost the ability to receive and send e-mails using my old pop-server account. I tried many things at this communities recommendations but no success. So I changed the name of my old e-mail address and then created a new email account with my former e-mail name and also set up the new e-mail account to an IMAP account. Then when prompted for a password, I correctly inputted the Spectrum webmail password and now I receive e-mails to this account on Thunderbird! Hurray!! However, I still cannot send out e-mails from this account as I get the message that the outgoing server "(SMTP) mail.twc.com" timed out. And no - it is not an antivirus issue.

By the way, my phone e-mail account of the same address is able to send out e-mail messages. However, I wish to handle my most sensitive messages to send off of my desktop version of the same e-mail address and that is where I am not able to send an e-mail.

Yikes - Thunderbird.
creator: zbadger

title: Creazione account
content: Buongiorno, non riesco a creare il mio account email su Thunderbird. Mi continua a dare Errore di autenticazione, ma le credenziali sono corrette. come posso fare?
creator: elena.verita

title: Ergonomie
content: Bonjour, Je ne comprends pas l'anglais et je suis nul en informatique. Lorsque j'ouvre Thunderbird, la moitié de l'écran est occupé par une demande de don. Je n'arrive pas à enlever cette demande de don. Comment faut il faire ? Cette publicité, aussi légitime soit elle, pénalise l'usage de votre produit qui a des fonctionnalités intéressantes. Merci de ne pas auto-saboter votre produit et votre prestation. Sincèrement Henry Pottier PS / J'ai déja fait un don à Thundebird, mais je n'ai reçu aucun reçu fiscal de votre part, ce qui est une condition indispensable à toute réalisation de don.
creator: henr.pottier

title: Unable to log in to Outlook and Gmail accounts
content:
我在outlook、gmail分别有两个邮件账号，现在分别登录了其中的一个hotmail和gmail账户后，另一个outlook账户和另一个别名的gmail账户都登录不上去了（原本计划登录一个outlook、一个hotmail、两个gmail账户的），总是提示验证失败。请检查用户名和密码 Exchange auth error ，我尝试删除 Cookie 和 “已保存密码”，依然无法登录，请求工作人员的帮助！

I have two email accounts, one in Outlook and one in Gmail. After logging into one of my Hotmail and Gmail accounts, I can't log into either my other Outlook account or my Gmail alias (my original plan was to log into one Outlook, one Hotmail, and both Gmail accounts). I keep getting the "Authentication failed" message: "Please check your username and password. Exchange auth error." I've tried deleting my cookies and "saved passwords," but I still can't log in. Please help!
creator: w9uk5ie8v

title: Langauge support for fusion of SENT in EN & "Gesendete Elements" in German
content:
Need support for multi-language support for folder settings:

I am using Thunderbird(EN) as email client to retrieve emails outlook server in German(DE).

Yet the SENT folder there named "Gesendete Elements" in German. This makes the sent emails placed in 2 different folders, same as other folders (e.g. Draft, outgoing...), i.e.: Emails sent from iPhone can be found in German "Gesendete Elemente", Emails sent from Thunderbird(macOS) placed in "Sent", In Thunderbird(macOS) I no folder of "Gesendete Elemente" under this account.

I tried the troubeshooting method at Microsoft/Outlook: ["https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/troubleshoot/outlook/user-interface/incorrect-folder-names" | trouble-shooting method at Microsoft] ,

Not working. Hereby macOS native mail client has no issue as well as iPhone. So that must be a issue of Thunderbird. Please help.

How to fuse/ auto designate the "Gesendete Elemente" as SENT etc. ?
creator: hr.stein

title: Viestin lähettäminen epäonnistuu, koska toisen osapuolen varmenne on mitätöity
content:
Hei,

Yritän lähettää viestiä, ja saan ilmoituksen: "viestin lähettäminen epäonnistui. Toisen osapuolen varmenne on mitätöity. Lähtevän palvelimen vastaukseen liittyvät asetukset täytyy korjata."

Kun painan OK, tulee ikkuna: Lisää turvallisuuspoikkeus, ja teksti: "Olet muuttamassa Thunderbirdin tapaa todentaa tämä sivusto. Luotettavat pankit, kaupat ja muut julkiset sivustot eivät pyydä sinua tekemään tätä" Lisäksi olisi ladattava varmenne ja vahvistettava turvallisuuspoikkeus.

Kysymys: voinko luottaa tähän ja sallia turvallisuuspoikkeuksen? Mistä tiedän, että tämä ei ole huijaus, vaikka ilmoitus tuleekin Thunderbirdillä viestiä lähetettäessä. En ole tehnyt koneellani mitään asetusmuutoksia enkä myöskään ole saanut operaattoriltani mitään ilmoituksia tällaisten muutosten tarpeesta. Tämä ilmoitus ilmeni siis ihan yllättäen.

yt. Petri Mäntynen
creator: petrimaju.mantynen

title: Threading, missing associations
content: Why is threading enabled by default in TB after installation? I add an existing IMAP account to the program. I set sorting by date. If someone replies to an email from a month ago, it's difficult to find it in threading. It used to be possible to enable it manually, but now it's enabled by default. TB can also lose attachment opening preferences in programs after an update, such as .pdf or .doc. Note that some PDF documents don't display correctly in the built-in preview and require the use of Adobe Reader.
creator: noraves99

title: kein Empfang+Versenden von mails über thunderbird mehr möglich
content:
Moin zusammen, ich bin seit vielen Jahren Kunde bei Osnatel und Thunderbird. Seit dem 14.9.'25 kann ich bei Thunderbird keine mails mehr empfangen und versenden und ich weiß nicht, warum. Ich bekomme von Thunderbird dann immer folgende Meldungen: "Anmeldung auf dem Server imap.osnanet.de fehlgeschlagen" mit den darunterstehenden Optionen "Nochmals versuchen", "Neues Passwort eingeben" (was nach Versuch auch nicht funktionierte) und "Abbrechen". Wenn ich eine mail versenden möchte, kommt folgende Meldung von Thunderbird: "Senden der Nachricht fehlgeschlagen. Der Postausgangsserver (SMTP) kann nicht authentifiziert werden. Bitte überprüfen Sie das Passwort und die gewählte 'Authentifizierungsmethode' unter 'Konteneinstellungen Postausgangsserver'." Da bin ich gewesen und check leider nicht, was ich da machen bzw. verändern muss.

Besten Dank für Ihre Hilfe!!

Christa Nöst, Osnabrück cnoest@osnanet.de
creator: cnoest

title: Howto move Thunderbird database from Windows to Linux
content:
I wasn't sure whether 'Settings' was the best topic, so if it's not, I apologize.

I'm trying to move my big Thunderbird email environment from Windows 11 to Linux Ubuntu so I can run Tbird on Linux with all my email available.

I've moved the entire database over to Linux to where I want to put it and modified the profile.ini file to point to it, but whenever I start Tbird on Linux, it acts as though there's no profile.

WINDOWS CONFIG:

I put the Tbird database at c:\apk\profiles\thunderbird

This is the location of the profile.ini file 

   c:\users\paulkinz\appdata\roaming\thunderbird\profiles.ini

This is the contents of the profile.ini: 

   [InstallD78BF5DD33499EC2]    Default=c:\apk\profiles\thunderbird    Locked=1 
   [Profile0]    Name=Default User    IsRelative=0    Path=c:\apk\profiles\thunderbird 
   [General]    StartWithLastProfile=1    Version=2

LINUX CONFIG:

Tbird database located at /home/paulkinz/apk/profiles/thunderbird

location of the profile.ini file: /home/paulkinz/snap/thunderbird/common/.thunderbird/profiles.ini

This is the contents of Linux profiles.ini 

   [Profile0]    Name=default    IsRelative=0    Path=/home/paulkinz/apk/profiles/thunderbird    Default=1 
   [General]    StartWithLastProfile=1    Version=2

I changed StartWithLastProfile to be 0, but everytime I run Tbird, it doesn't look at where I've put the Tbird database and changes this item to 1.

And a curiosity question - why does it put the Tbird database under some random directory name like 'default.5yr2afk4' or something? What's the value in not putting it in some common place like it does the profile.ini file?
creator: paul92

title: Add a gmail account impossible
content: I am trying to add my gmail account to Thunderbird, with the normal procedure. It immediately gives the correct settings with OAuth, send me to Google to get the permission when confirming these, then displays «Unable to connect to the server. The configuration, username or password are probably incorrect.», although I have double checked all of these. The same thing happens to a friend I am trying to help (with the latest Thunderbird version available) (140.2.0esr on Ubuntu 24.4.3 in my case). I wonder what happens, as I used to install Thunderbird and add accounts easily, from Google or other services, on a number of people's computer, a few months ago.
